alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Decatur; Rawlins; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Warning issued April 06 at 12:33PM CDT until April 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MDT /NOON CDT/ TO 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds gusting up to 70 mph and blowing dust with visibility less than one quarter mile. * WHERE...Cheyenne, Rawlins, Decatur, Sherman, Thomas, and Sheridan Counties. * WHEN...From now through 7 pm MDT /8 pm CDT/ this evening. For the High Wind Warning on Thursday, from 11 AM MDT /noon CDT/ to 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/. * IMPACTS...Severely limited visibilities are expected. Travel will be dangerous and life-threatening. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Several reports of near zero visibility have been received across the warned area. We urge travelers to get off area roadways as soon as possible due to the zero visibility dust storm developing. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... The Kansas Department of Health and Environment recommends that you take preventative measures during this blowing dust event... such as staying indoors or wearing protective breathing masks if outside. High dust concentrations can cause respiratory problems...decrease lung activity...aggravate asthma...and lead to potential heart-related problems...especially with children... elderly...or those with pre-existing respiratory conditions. If you encounter blowing dust or blowing sand on the roadway or see it approaching, pull off the road as far as possible and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights all the way off and keep your foot off the brake pedal. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne; Decatur; Rawlins; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas
